publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2691 Trish Godman: Scottish Public Service Employees—That the Parliament has every confidence in Scottish public service employees and acknowledges their integrity and commitment to the efficient and effective provision of a vast range of public services; notes their readiness to adapt to changing circumstances and willingness to improve services especially when such changes are based upon genuine consultation, and believes that many of the individual and communal needs and requirements in both urban and rural communities are best met by services, utilities and resources which are retained in the public sector and managed and staffed by those who have a sympathetic understanding of, and engagement with, a public service ethos.
S1M-2691 Scottish Public Service Employees (lodged on 4 February 2002) Kay Ullrich*, Stewart Stevenson*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-2691 Trish Godman: Scottish Public Service Employees—That the Parliament has every confidence in Scottish public service employees and acknowledges their integrity and commitment to the efficient and effective provision of a vast range of public services; notes their readiness to adapt to changing circumstances and willingness to improve services especially when such changes are based upon genuine consultation, and believes that many of the individual and communal needs and requirements in both urban and rural communities are best met by services, utilities and resources which are retained in the public sector and managed and staffed by those who have a sympathetic understanding of, and engagement with, a public service ethos. Supported by: Kay Ullrich, Stewart Stevenson, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Jamie Stone*, Fiona Hyslop*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2691 Scottish Public Service Employees (lodged on 4 February 2002) Shona Robison*
S1M-2691 Scottish Public Service Employees (lodged on 4 February 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Maureen Macmillan*, Nora Radcliffe*, Michael Russell*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*
S1M-2691 Scottish Public Service Employees (lodged on 4 February 2002) Cathie Craigie*
S1M-2691 Scottish Public Service Employees (lodged on 4 February 2002) Linda Fabiani*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2691 Scottish Public Service Employees (lodged on 4 February 2002) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-2691 Scottish Public Service Employees (lodged on 4 February 2002) Cathy Peattie*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Bill Butler*
S1M-2691 Scottish Public Service Employees (lodged on 4 February 2002) Jackie Baillie*
S1M-2691 Scottish Public Service Employees (lodged on 4 February 2002) Susan Deacon*
S1M-2691 Scottish Public Service Employees (lodged on 4 February 2002) Elaine Smith*
